subject: Boxing
Sports Injuries
lead_paragraph: For Magomed Abdusalamov, 34, also known as the Russian Tyson, life was never the same after he lost for the first time in his 19th professional fight.
snippet: For Magomed Abdusalamov, 34, also known as the Russian Tyson, life was never the same after he lost for the first time in his 19th professional fight.
